title: CiviGuard — Red-Team Drills & Incident Snapshots
summary: Recurring adversarial exercises (technical, process, narrative) with capture of minimal, privacy-preserving incident snapshots and public postmortems.
rationale: ‘Practice the breach’ keeps us honest, strengthens culture, and generates artifacts for community learning.
impact: Fewer blind spots, faster incident response, and a healthier safety posture across products and protectorates.
